ModMetaData.name: Dune Style Pack
ModMetaData.author: Halituis Amaricanus
ModMetaData.description:
Mod adds a Style pack for the Ideology DLC - The dune style pack adds themed weapons, armor, and buildings to help fit the Arrakis experince. Style and weapons are Inspired by various Fan art and official works Inspired by; Dune originally created by Frank Herbert now owned by Herbert Properties and Legendary Entertainment.
Mod Replaces / Adds 140 Unique sprites.
CREDITS
♦ Halituis Amaricanous : Art and XML ♦ Games Workshop Limited and JesperKyd : Ideology theme "Offworld Auspex" game edit ♦ Ogam : Apparel Art ♦ Frank Herbert : Original creator of dune
